name: find_PAM
description: Finds the position of the first 'GG' PAM sequence in a DNA target sequence after the 23rd position.

inputs.name: target
inputs.description: DNA sequence to be searched. Must consist of valid nucleotides ('A', 'T', 'C', 'G').

outputs.description: Index of the first occurrence of 'GG' in the target sequence after the 23rd position.
